capabilities.name: search_events_by_artist
capabilities.description:
Search for art events by artist name with fuzzy matching.
        
        Args:
            artist_name: The name of the artist to search for (can contain typos)
        
        Returns:
            JSON string containing matching events with artist and venue information

capabilities.name: search_events_by_date_range
capabilities.description:
Search for art events that are visitable during a date range or on a specific date.
        Returns events whose date ranges intersect with the search range.
        
        Args:
            start_date: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional if specific_date is provided)
            end_date: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional if specific_date is provided)
            specific_date: Specific date in YYYY-MM-DD format (alternative to date range)
        
        Returns:
            JSON string containing events that are visitable during the specified date range

capabilities.name: search_events_today
capabilities.description:
Search for art events happening today (automatically uses current date).
        This is useful for LLMs that don't have access to the current date.
        
        Returns:
            JSON string containing events happening today
